Line.MultilineString: To join you alchemists guild you have to take 3 examinations. The final test is to make 3 potions with your gathered herbs.

"Vitalis Luminaris is a curious plant that can have a variety of effects depending on how its prepared. I want you to make 3 potions with that buds you gathered, showing off all the 3 effects. Just be careful of the dangerous fumes it produces. Good luck."
You fail the test. You won't become an alchemist this time.
You pass the test! The examiner walks over and shakes your hand.
"Very well done, an impressive performance! Here is your guild badge and certificate, you are now officially an alchemist."
